Fix libxslt-dev reference

The libxslt package on Ubuntu is actually named libxslt1-dev, but it
provised the libxslt-dev package.  This means that each time puppet
runs, it looks for, doesn't find and reinstalls libxslt-dev, which
actually installs libxslt1-dev.

Change-Id: I5c8e484157e27645b9eaaddf7ca094b08ae5decd

Add tag to package and service resources

In order to be able to take an action after all the packages of the
module have been installed/updated or all the services have been
started/restarted, we set a 'monasca-package' and 'monasca-service'
tag for each package and service of this module.

At the moment, there is a generic openstack tag that is not specific
enough if one wants to take action upon a single module change.

Use case :

If an action needs to be taken after all the packages have been
installed or updated : Package <| tag == 'monasca-package' |> -> X
